participant_1.background:
I eat my feelings.
I'm often disappointed in myself, but I try to stay positive and do my best.
i like spreading laughter and love everywhere i go.
I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.

participant_2.background:
I usually spend my free time practicing music or reading about clothing trends.
i am an art teacher.
I would love to have lunch with my sponsor, who has helped me so much on my journey of recovery.
I enjoy spending time with my nieces and nephews, helping them get fit and have fun at the same time.
I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend.

content.text: Hi!
Hey there! How are you?
I'm doing okay, just hanging out. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm getting ready for a big event this weekend.
Oh, that sounds exciting! What kind of event is it?
It's a music festival. I'm going to be performing with my band.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it.
I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
Yeah, I'm hoping so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice music, read about clothing trends, and spend time with my nieces and nephews.
Oh, that sounds fun. I like to write stories, read, and spend time with my friends.
Those all sound like great hobbies.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing to do with your nieces and nephews?
I like to help them get fit and have fun at the same time.
That's really nice of you. I'm sure they love it.
Yeah, they do.
Do you have any pets?
Yeah, I have a cat named Oscar. He's my best friend.
That's awesome! I love cats.
Me too!
